name: Echo Girl
info:
• 别名: 최경주
  • 别名: Choi Kyungju
  • 性别: 女
  • 职业: 偶像
detail:
Echo Girl (real name Kyungju Choi) is a side character who is involved in majority of Zen's route, and can be considered as the antagonist in the events of his route.

She is a young flirty idol and a fan of Zen that is always trying to hit on him, as shown in many of Zen's visual novel mode events.
